questions.questionText: How many medals did Israeli athletes won so far in the Olympic games (answer would be numerical)?
Who is the only gold medal winner in the history of Israel at the Olympic games?
Israel Has two athletes that won bronze medal in Rio Olympic games this year at the judo competitions. What is the name of the first judoka to win it in Rio 2016?
Israel has only one athlete that won a silver medal in the Olympic games. What his (or her) last name?
